title: 197: Conscious Relationships and Masculinity with Stefanos Sifandos
itunes:title: 197: Conscious Relationships and Masculinity with Stefanos Sifandos
description:
From finding a conscious dude to balancing feminine/ mascuilne dynamics in a relationship, this episode covers it all! I ask spiritual partnership expert Stefanos all YOUR love questions and the answers are amazing! You will NOT want to miss this extra juicy eisode!

Connect with Stefanos at @stefanossifandos.
